attr.title: Hexen 2
attr.desc: Hexen II is a dark fantasy 1st-person shooter developed by Raven Software and published by id software. Portal of Praevus features new levels, new enemies and a new playable character class, The Demoness.
attr.inst: You must copy your Hexen 2 pak0.pak and pak1.pak files into hexen2/data1 and your pak3.pak into hexen2/portals and make sure they're lowercase. Thanks to sezero (Ozkan Sezer) for the HoT source port
